document.full_text: china's yuan will one day play a major role as a global reserve currency, although the u.s. dollar will remain an important currency, european council president herman van rompuy said on wednesday.
document.title: yuan to someday play major role as reserve currency
lines_and_colors: china's yuan will one day play a major role as a global reserve currency, although the u.s. dollar will remain an important currency, european council president herman van rompuy said on wednesday.
